hero.title: Fincha Sugar Factory
hero.subtitle: From fields to future-focused products: discover our sugar, ethanol, and by-products supporting Ethiopia's growth.

highlights.title: What sets Fincha apart
highlights.description: An integrated agro-industrial hub powering Ethiopia's sugar value chain with sustainable innovation.

who_we_are.title: A Legacy of Excellence
who_we_are.description_1: Fincha Sugar Factory is a cornerstone of Ethiopia's industrial landscape. Since our establishment, we have continually expanded our capacity to become an integrated agro-industrial powerhouse in the heart of the Fincha Valley.
who_we_are.description_2: Our massive operations span thousands of hectares. We are dedicated to creating high-impact products—from premium sugar and fuel-grade ethanol to clean co-generated electricity—while empowering local communities and fostering sustainable agricultural growth.
who_we_are.bullet_3: Commitment to green energy and zero waste

products.title: Featured products
products.description: High-quality sugar products and downstream solutions crafted with precision.

projects.title: Strategic projects
projects.description: Major agro-industrial projects boosting national supply chains.

csr.title: CSR & Sustainability
csr.description: Programs transforming livelihoods and protecting the environment.

focus.title: Community livelihood empowerment
focus.description: Supporting farmers, youth and women with skills training, finance and guaranteed offtake.

impact.title: Environmental stewardship
impact.description: Investing in watershed restoration, renewable energy and climate-smart agriculture.

news.title: Latest news & updates
news.description: Stay informed with company announcements and industry insights.

items.title: Fincha scales ethanol production to support clean fuels
items.summary: New distillation upgrades improve efficiency and reduce emissions across the campus.

items.title: Community outgrower program expands irrigated hectares
items.summary: Smallholder farmers gain access to agronomy training and guaranteed offtake agreements.

items.title: Fincha inaugurates vocational training center
items.summary: Technical apprenticeships prepare youth for skilled roles in agro-industrial operations.

media.title: Media spotlight
media.description: Photos and videos capturing our operations and community outreach.
media.caption: Captured at Fincha operations

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: Collaborating with public and private stakeholders across Ethiopia and beyond.

faqs.title: Quick answers
faqs.description: Popular questions about our products, services, and opportunities.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe for tender alerts, career updates, and production insights.

contact.title: Let's build together
contact.description: Connect with our team for sales inquiries, partnerships, or community engagements.

innovation.title: Transforming cane into clean energy and opportunity
innovation.description: Beyond sugar, Fincha pioneers irrigation technology, co-generation energy and digital traceability to secure supply chains and uplift communities.
innovation.smart_irrigation_desc: Satellite-supported monitoring and smart irrigation systems keep every hectare productive while conserving water.
innovation.green_energy_desc: Co-generation turbines convert bagasse into clean electricity, powering operations and contributing to the grid.
innovation.digital_transformation_desc: QR-enabled product tracing and ERP-ready APIs open the door to real-time logistics and cross-border trade.

metrics.title: Industrial performance in motion
metrics.description: Fincha Sugar Factory operates one of Ethiopia's largest integrated agro-industrial campuses, turning cane into sugar, ethanol and renewable energy.
metrics.sugar_desc: Metric tons of refined sugar produced after the two-phase expansion.
metrics.ethanol_desc: Liters of fuel-grade ethanol distilled from molasses every year.
metrics.energy_desc: Megawatts of clean electricity exported from bagasse turbine systems.
metrics.jobs_desc: Permanent, contract and seasonal roles, plus surrounding community beneficiaries.

distribution.title: Delivering Sweetness Worldwide
distribution.description: Our strategic location and robust logistics network ensure reliable supply from the Fincha Valley to international markets.

certifications.title: Certified Excellence
certifications.description: Adhering to the highest global standards in quality, safety, and environmental stewardship.

testimonials.title: Impact Beyond Production
testimonials.description: Hear from the partners, employees, and community members who drive our shared success.

timeline.title: Decades of Growth
timeline.description: From a visionary project to an agro-industrial powerhouse.

video.title: A Day in the Life
video.description: Witness the dedication, technology, and scale of our daily operations.

dayInLife.title: A Day in the Life at Fincha
dayInLife.description: From sunrise to sunset, see how our team powers Ethiopia's sugar industry.

gm_message.title: Driving Sustainable Growth for Ethiopia
gm_message.quote: At Fincha Sugar Factory, we are not just producing sugar and energy; we are building a sustainable future for our communities and our nation. Our commitment to excellence, innovation, and environmental stewardship guides every decision we make.
gm_message.name: General Manager / CEO

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: The foundational beliefs that drive our operations, culture, and commitment to excellence.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We uphold the highest ethical standards in all our operations and relationships.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: We are committed to environmental stewardship and ensuring a greener future.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We strive for continuous improvement and superior quality in everything we do.

items.title: Community
items.description: We actively empower and invest in the well-being of the communities we serve.

impact.title: Empowering Beyond Production
impact.description: Our success is deeply intertwined with the prosperity of the Fincha Valley. We are dedicated to creating lasting, positive change through comprehensive community programs.
achievements: Constructed and equipped multiple local schools.
Built modern healthcare clinics serving thousands.
Developed and maintained vital regional road networks.
Provided extensive agronomy training to outgrower farmers.

timeline.title: A Legacy of Quality
timeline.description: Tracing our journey of continuous improvement, certifications, and national recognition.

items.title: National Industry Award
items.description: Awarded for outstanding contribution to the agro-industrial sector.
